content: That sounds great! I think I'll make the Ratatouille ahead of time and reheat it before serving. By the way, speaking of friends, I was thinking of inviting Rachel and Emily to the dinner party, and maybe a few other close friends. I brought back souvenirs from Paris for them, and it would be nice to catch up and share some stories about my trip. Do you think I should send out formal invitations or just a casual text?
